TextView.android:text: Registration of on time birth (0-30 days from date of birth) & delayed registration of birth (31 days & above from date of birth.

- Father or Mother
- Relative
- Guardian
- Barangay Secretary/Punong Barangay
- Midwife
1. Philippine Statistics Authority or Municipal Civil Registry Office
2. Certification from the barangay (1 original copy)
3. Certification issued by Midwife/Nurse (1 original copy)
4. Barangay Treasurer or Municipal Treasurer's Office
1. Father & Mother to bring current year CTC (1 original copy)
1. Barangay Treasurer or Municipal Treasurer’s Office
2. Certification from the barangay (Birth Registration) (1 original copy)
3. Certification issued by Midwife/Nurse (1 original copy)
1. Barangay Treasurer or Municipal Treasurer's Office
2. Philippine Statistics Authority or Municipal Civil Registry Office
3. Document that shows the birthplace and birthdate (1 original copy)
3. MHO, School, PSA, NBI, SSS, GSIS, LTO, DFA, Post Office, National ID
5. Philippine Statistics Authority or Municipal Civil Registry Office
1. Father & Mother to bring current year CTC (1 original copy)
1. Barangay Treasurer or Municipal Treasurer’s Office
2. All of the above requirement except the COM
1. Submit requirement to the receiving clerk

2.1. Let the customer sign the informant’s portion

2.2. And the receiving clerk to sign the “Prepared by” portion

2.3. Present for MCR’S approval and signature.

2.4. Affix seal

2.5. Segregate the accomplished COLB.
4. Present the OR to the Receiving clerk and receive the owner’s copy
4.1. Attach the OR and give the owner’s copy
1. Submit requirements to the receiving clerk
1.1. Received,\n\n1.2. Process/ Type COLB, Notice for Posting

2.1. Let the customer sign the informant’s portion, & the Affidavit of Delayed Registration at the back

2.2. And the receiving clerk to sign the “Prepared by” portion

2.3. Present to MCR to sign the Affidavit. At the back
3.1. Process payment and issue Official Receipt

₱150.00
(Delayed Registration aged 2 months to 19 yr. Old)

₱200.00
(Delayed Registration 19 yrs old and above)
4. Present the OR to the Receiving Clerk

4.1 Accept OR

4.2. Advice the customer to come back after 10 days posting, & post “Notice”

4.3. After 10 days, receiving clerk affix registry number

4.4. Seal

4.5. Present accomplished COLB to the MCR/Assistant for review and signature

4.6. Segregate and file
5. After 10 days, customer get the Accomplished COLB
6. Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) and drop it in the feedback box
6.1. Request Client to Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) form in the feedback box
